cab.content: 5(P 2860)Secretary of State to Viceroy, Foreign Department, J ' ' ' 16t/i /ipni 1920.Clear the line.Foreign Secret/ Your telegram of 12th April. Afghanistan. Points 1, 2 and 3 are approved. I shall be prepared to consider point 4 if occasion arises, but I cannot commit myself in advance, and feel bound to warn you that there is strong opposition to be overcome. Points 5 and 6 approved. Remarks in your final paragraph have my full concurrence. -
